actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to provide representation in the case of State of Connecticut v. Patricia L. Nuelsen, and in related cases, and to authorize testimony and the production of documents.

summary.text: Authorizes Stanley Israelite, Lise Heintz, and Edward Mann to testify and provide documents in the case of State of Connecticut v. Patricia L. Nuelsen and the Senate Legal Counsel to represent any Member or employee of the Senate in such case.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to provide representation in the case of State of Connecticut v. Patricia L. Nuelsen, and in related cases, and to authorize testimony and the production of documents.
